title: Bobotie meatloaf
ingredients: ['2 slices dry white bread', '1 tablespoon butter', '2 onions, chopped', '500g beef mince', '4 garlic cloves, minced', '2 tablespoons red chilli paste', '1/2 teaspoon dried mint', '1/2 teaspoon dried thyme', '3 cloves', '5 allspice berries', '4 tablespoons mango chutney', '3 tablespoons raisins', '2 bay leaves', 'salt and pepper to taste', '200ml milk', '3 eggs, lightly beaten']
